hotel name: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
pos review: The location, in the middle of nature
neg review: Very old fashioned rooms, dirty carpet, dirty armchair, basic bathroom

hotel name: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
pos review: The place was being refurbed and the staff really were very un helpful We were a group of 6 people and wanted two twin rooms and one double we got a double plus another double and a triple room but really was not what we asked for . the bar was open and took the staff twenty mins to serve us for one drink then a new staff member  arrived and he would not serve us until after 0000 and we were wanting a beer at 1144 joke. never again use this place looks stunning and run by idiots
neg review: loads not good the bathroom in the triple room was dirty and not suitable for three people

hotel name: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
pos review: Beautiful scenery! The castle with his rooms on a sunny hill are lovely and relaxing, as well is the brand new spa. Great for a weekend out.
neg review: Unfortunately the restaurant isn't open except on Friday and Saturday, and the bar is very unoccupied as well, so besides you might getting hungry, the hotel misses some lively athmosphere.

hotel name: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
pos review: The breakfast was perfect! Ideal location and great views. I'v never seen such a good service, very friendly and professional staff.

hotel name: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
neg review: No tea/ coffee making facilities in the bedroom.

hotel name: Domaine de Ronchinne - Chateau et Ecuries
pos review: Lovely place to stay with lots of charm. Great balance of activities. Staff very kind and competent.
neg review: The family lodging was like a dormitory without any charm in contrast to the rest of the place. Just 4 beds little furniture and the ceiling beams at 1.65 m high were like obstacles. So quality for price no what we expected.
